items.title: Bug: Application crashes on startup
items.body:
The application consistently crashes when attempting to start on macOS 15.1.

**Steps to reproduce:**
1. Download latest release
2. Double-click to launch
3. Crash occurs immediately

**Expected behavior:**
Application should start normally

**System info:**
- macOS 15.1
- Intel processor
I've reproduced this issue and it appears to be related to missing dependencies. Investigating further.

items.reason: Need to generate test coverage reports for quality metrics
items.alternatives: Consider using jest --coverage or c8 for Node.js projects
